title: 1st Service
speakers: Apostle Wyatt Fabe

title: 2nd Service
speakers: Pastor Tonya Hill

title: Official Opening
topic: Rise and Build unity among African countries as one nation.
speakers: Apostle Dr Paul Gitwaza, Archbishop Laurent Mbanda, Prof Vincent Anigbogu

title: Morning Session: Business
topic: (1) What does God's altar and a satanic altar look like in a business context and how does building one and destroying the other contribute to the overall success of a business? (2) How to work strategically with ungodly business partners?
speakers: Mr Dumi Lopang, Apostle Dr Samuel Hayes

title: Morning Session: Intercession
topic: (1) Why is intercession key in building the altar to the Lord and destroying the satanic altar? (2) What role can intercessors play in promoting healthy relationships among African nations?
speakers: Apostle Linda Gobodo, Apostle Wyatt Fabe & Team

title: Morning Session: Religion
topic: (1) How can Churches and ministries build the altar to the Lord that will destroy the satanic altars in communities? (2) What are some of the satanic altars that have bedeviled African nations and how can we as a church expose and destroy them?
speakers: Rev Dr Antoine Rutayisire, Bishop Titus Masika

title: Morning Session: Family
topic: (1) Why is it important to build the altar to the Lord and destroy satanic altars in our families? (2) What joint efforts can be made between African nations to tackle common challenges affecting our families?
speakers: Apostle Dr. Philip Igbinijesu, Prof Vincent Anigbogu

title: Morning Session: Education
topic: (1) How can we build the altar to the Lord that will dismantle satanic ideologies and practices within the educational systems? (2) What are the visible satanic altars that are influencing the sphere of education?
speakers: Prof. Obii Pax-Harry, Dr Henry Mugisha

title: Revival Meeting
topic: Rise and Build the altar to the Lord and Destroy the satanic altar.
speakers: Pastor Dr Henry Mugisha, Dr. Birlie Belay, Rev. Dr. Fessehaye T.

title: Morning Session: Business
topic: (1) How to encourage and raise Godly business owners to advance the Kingdom of God? (2) Why are Godly values and principles critical in the business world and how do they translate into prosperous corporations and national economies?
speakers: Pastor Dr Henry Mugisha, Prof Vincent Anigbogu

title: Morning Session: Intercession
topic: (1) Interpreting and relating with the intercessory prayer of Nehemiah as African intercessors. (2) How does incorporating intercession in all other spheres enhance the wellbeing of churches, families, schools, businesses as well as communities?
speakers: Apostle Yemi Adefarasin, Apostle Linda Gobodo

title: Morning Session: Religion
topic: (1) How can the African church contribute to the socio-economic development of Africa. (2) What caliber of church leaders do we need to prevent the moral failures among church and ministry leaders?
speakers: Bishop Dr. Titus Masika, Bishop Joseph Mattera

title: Morning Session: Family
topic: (1) How does upholding Godly values and principles impact the relationships and stability in families? (2) Many modern cultural and societal norms conflict with Godly values and principles. How can a family maintain Godly values in this secular world?
speakers: Dr Gahungu Bunini, Prof. Obii Pax-Harry

title: Morning Session: Education
topic: (1) What best education practices from other countries can be adapted into African education systems and how would international partnerships and strategic alliance improve the quality of our education? (2) With the current satanic agenda to influence the moral and spiritual atmosphere in the education system, how can we redeem and protect our schools and why is it very important?
speakers: Prof. Alfred Bizoza, Apostle Dr Samuel Hayes

title: Revival Meeting
topic: Rise and Build spiritual walls: God's values and principles in Africa.
speakers: Prof Obii Pax-Harry, Bishop Titus Masika, Apostle Victor Mokgotlhoa

title: Morning Session: Business
topic: (1) How can the African diaspora leverage partnerships with African firms, governments and NGO to promote economic development? (2) What role can the African diaspora and people of African descent play in enhancing global competitiveness of African businesses?
speakers: Apostle Atsalie Yasmir, Apostle Dr Samuel Hayes

title: Morning Session: Intercession
topic: (1) How can the diaspora and people of African descent build collective resilience and spiritual solidarity with communities in Africa through intercession? (2) What strategies can be used to mobilize and coordinate prayer networks focused on intercession for Africa?
speakers: Apostle David Bansie, Bishop Titus Masika

title: Morning Session: Religion
topic: (1) How to engage African churches to partner and pray for Israel? (2) How can we mobilize to evangelize and engage all the scattered people of African descent to work in unity towards rebuilding Africa (Ex. of Israel)?
speakers: Dr. Birlie Belay, Rev. Dr. Fessehaye T.

title: Morning Session: Family
topic: (1) What is the state of families of African diaspora and people of African descent in the western countries? How to help them? (2) How can the African diaspora and people of African descent preserve Godly values and pass them down to the next generations?
speakers: Apostle Isaac Leslie, Apostle Victor Mokgotlhoa

title: Morning Session: Education
topic: (1) How can the African diaspora and people of African descent practically contribute to the advancement of education in Africa? (2) How can the African diaspora contribute to 'quality' education in Africa (education that imparts the right skills needed to solve problems)?
speakers: Dr Charles Muligande, Prof. Obii Pax-Harry

title: Revival Meeting
topic: Role of diaspora and people of African descent in rebuilding Africa.
speakers: Pastor Tonya Hill, Apostle Dr Samuel & Andrea Hayes, Apostle Dr. Philip Igbinijesu

title: Morning Session: Media
topic: The role of the media in advancing God's Kingdom in Africa
speakers: Pastor Felin Gakwaya, Mr Dumi Lopang, Mr Aimable Rukundo

title: Revival Meeting
topic: Rise and Build a healthy relationship with other nations.
speakers: Mr Dumi Lopang, Apostle Linda Gobodo, Bishop Joseph Mattera

title: Morning Session: Entertainment
topic: The role of the Entertainment and Sports mountain in advancing God's Kingdom in Africa
speakers: Apostle Dr. Philip Igbinijesu, Mr. Kamasa, Pastor Kennedy M. , Pastor Dr Henry M

title: Revival Meeting
topic: Build a strong army of missionaries to the 7 mountains and the world.
speakers: Apostle Atsalie Yasmir, Apostle David Bansie, Apostle Dr. Francis Mbadinga

title: Youth Arise
speakers: Bishop Joseph Mattera, Apostle Dr Samuel Hayes

title: Women Arise
speakers: Pastor Tonya Hill, Mrs. Louise Elizabeth Isaac, Mrs. Andrea Marsh Hayes, Prof. Obii Pax-Harry, and Apostle Linda Gobodo

title: Men Arise
speakers: Apostle David Bansie, Apostle Atsalie Yasmir, Mr Dumi Lopang, and  Apostle Isaac Leslie

title: Revival Meeting
topic: Wisdom is the principal asset to build the nation.
speakers: Apostle Isaac & Mrs Leslie, Apostle Yemi Adefarasin

title: 1st Service
speakers: Dr. Birlie. B, Rev. Dr. Fessehaye

title: 2nd Service
speakers: Apostle Dr. Philip Igbinijesu

title: Revival Meeting
speakers: Apostle Dr Paul Gitwaza, Pastor Angelique Nyinawingeli
